definition: to set foot on (a foreign land etc)/to tread/(fig.) to enter (a new sphere)
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
see 踏實|踏实[ta1 shi5]
excessive
foot/to be sufficient/ample

sentences.english: Once a year, go some place you've never been before.
sentences.chinese: 每年拜访一个您未从踏足过的地方。

sentences.english: Without knowing it, you'll fall in love with the earth you're standing on.
sentences.chinese: 不自觉之间，你会爱上你踏足的大地。

sentences.english: But why do people tip taxi drivers they are never going to see again, or leave gratuities in restaurants in cities they rarely visit?
sentences.chinese: 同时又为什么要在难得踏足的城市，给餐厅留下赏钱？

sentences.english: This is the first time our band set foot on the land of the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们的乐队第一次踏足中东的大地。

sentences.english: Andrey has never been to the USA but would love to visit
sentences.chinese: Andrey从未踏足，但很希望访问美国。

sentences.english: Professors often joke about never making it below 110th Street.
sentences.chinese: 教授们常常开玩笑说他们从不踏足110街以下。

sentences.english: All sportswriters learn the rule before they set foot in a press box.
sentences.chinese: 所有体育记者踏足媒体席之前就都知道这条规矩。

sentences.english: This summer, One secret continent never reached.
sentences.chinese: 这个夏天，一块神秘的大陆从未踏足。

definition: to set foot in/to tread (in or on)/to walk into
to set foot in/to step into/to become involved for the first time
forbidden area/restricted area/(fig.) sth considered off-limits
to dip a finger (idiom); fig. to get one's finger in the pie/to get a share of the action/abbr. for 染指於鼎|染指于鼎
to set foot on/to step on or into
savage/wild/uncivilized territory
to surmount/to cross over
to stand firmly/to gain a foothold/to establish oneself
to walk into
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to intrude/to charge in/to gate-crash
here/this place
to visit places famous for their scenery
to return/to go back/to come back
to stay at/to stop over
to tour/to travel
